description: A large, modern city in northwest Iran with archaeological and textual evidence for dating potentially as early as the 9th or 8th century BCE.

history.comment: @thomase added references provided by the World Historical Gazetteer via a dataset derived from An Historical Atlas of Central Asia by Yuri Bregel (https://doi.org/10.60681/whg-dataset-838)
